description: After workers of N26 (digital bank) announced their intent to form a Works Council (Betriebsrat), management responded by issuing a legal injunction, banning 6 of the workers from partaking in formation of electoral committee. They forgot to include the service union Ver.di, so on August 13th, Ver.di chaired a meeting for N26 Operations GmbH, and workers voted for the first electoral committee.
author: Worker26
addresses: N26 Bank GmbH, 62, Klosterstraße, Mitte, Berlin, 10179, Deutschland
